name: Bigger
description:
You are a square that didn't ask to grow bigger, and yet you do even with the burdens it brings. Created for the 2020 Vertex Game Jam.

Arrow Keys: movement

Z: jump 

R: restart room.

One of the first game's I've made and the collisions are a bit wacky along with the views but I'm fairly happy with it. Graphics are omega simplistic and pretty trashy so sorry, should be a fun 5 or so minutes! :D
